statements: SELECT * FROM volunteer_info;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM volunteer_info;
SELECT volunteer_id, full_name, address FROM volunteer_info;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_info WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM volunteer_info WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, email FROM volunteer_info WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_info WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, address FROM volunteer_info WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_info WHERE volunteer_id > 3 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, email, address FROM volunteer_info WHERE address IS NULL ORDER BY volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers JOIN Events ON Volunteers.volunteer_id = Events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM Volunteers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers v INNER JOIN Events e ON v.volunteer_id = e.event_id;
SELECT full_name, contact_number FROM Volunteers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer_Info;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteer_Info WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Fundraising_Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_date, assignment_status FROM Volunteer_Assignments WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number, address FROM Volunteer_Info WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer_Info;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM Volunteer_Info WHERE volunteer_id = 1001;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Fundraising_Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT v.name, v.email, e.event_name FROM Volunteer_Info v JOIN Volunteer_Assignments va ON v.volunteer_id = va.volunteer_id JOIN Fundraising_Events e ON va.event_id = e.event_id WHERE va.assignment_status = 'completed';

SELECT v.name AS volunteer_name, e.event_name AS event_name, va.assignment_date AS assignment_date FROM Volunteer_Assignments va JOIN Volunteer_Info v ON va.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id JOIN Fundraising_Events e ON va.event_id = e.event_id WHERE v.phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT assignment_id, volunteer_id, event_id, assignment_date FROM VolunteerAssignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT fundraising_id, funds_raised, goal_amount FROM Fundraising WHERE funds_raised > goal_amount;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;

SELECT e.event_name, v.name, f.funds_raised FROM Events e JOIN VolunteerAssignments va ON e.event_id = va.event_id JOIN Volunteers v ON va.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id JOIN Fundraising f ON f.event_id = e.event_id;

SELECT v.name AS volunteer_name, e.event_name AS event_name, fa.assignment_date FROM Volunteers v JOIN VolunteerAssignments va ON v.volunteer_id = va.volunteer_id JOIN Events e ON va.event_id = e.event_id JOIN Fundraising fa ON e.event_id = fa.event_id WHERE va.assignment_id = 1;

SELECT e.event_name, v.name, va.assignment_date FROM Events e JOIN VolunteerAssignments va ON e.event_id = va.event_id JOIN Volunteers v ON va.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id WHERE va.assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount, donor_name FROM Donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, event_id, role FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT donation_amount, donor_name FROM Donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT volunteer_name, phone_number, email FROM Volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM Events WHERE location = 'New York' AND event_date >= '2022-01-01';
